text: hrux phwk khea klaw wa khea (muhammad) di pan tæ ngxalkurxan nan cng klaw theid muhammad tha chan di pan tæ ngxal ku rxa nkhu nph wk than k mimi xanac xan dı thi ca chwyhelux chan di cak (kar lngthosʹ khxng) xallxhˌ phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung sing thi phwk than kalang ngwn xyu nı reuxng ni phx pheiyng læw thi phraxngkh thrng pen phyan rahwang chan kab phwk than læa phraxngkh pen phuthrng xphay phuthrng metta semx
